title: Small bug fix
body: Fixed a bug where whitespace with the changelog file flag wouldn't work

title: Allow changelog file override from PRs
body:
<!-- changelogFile=false -->
Now by adding the `<!-- changelogFile=false -->` or `<!-- changelogFile=true -->` to its own line in your PR body, Octogration will override your config setting for that individual PR.

title: Allow for using independent configuration file
body: Instead of requiring all of the configuration options to be in the `package.json`, they can now be in its own file, `.octogrationdata`

title: Fix changelog file bug
body: We fixed a minor bug that failed to write the changelog depending on certain Github HTTP response codes. Also added plenty of documentation about configuration options.
